rows.label: tlk70000076_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Rumors of your expoilts are circulating
widely now. Even here.

rows.label: tlk70000076_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Seems like you've really made a name
for yourselves, exterminating monsters
and helping people in need.

rows.label: tlk70000076_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Ah, I bet one of these days they'll
build a statue of you or name a
building after you or something.

rows.label: tlk70000076_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Perhaps if I distinguish myself in
combat I'll get a building named
after me. Bathein's Laundrette! Haha!
